mapper.insert: INSERT tb_event( event_post_start_date, event_post_end_date, event_start_date, event_end_date, event_title, event_content, event_file_group_seq, create_id, update_id ) VALUES( CONCAT(#{postStartDate},' ',#{postStartHour}, ':',#{postStartMinute},':00'), CONCAT(#{postEndDate},' ',#{postEndHour}, ':',#{postEndMinute},':00'), CONCAT(#{eventStartDate},' ',#{eventStartHour}, ':',#{eventStartMinute},':00'), CONCAT(#{eventEndDate},' ',#{eventEndHour}, ':',#{eventEndMinute},':00'), #{eventTitle}, #{eventContent}, (SELECT ifnull(MAX(event_file_group_seq)+1, 1) FROM tb_event T), #{memberId}, #{memberId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_event SET event_post_start_date = CONCAT(#{postStartDate},' ',#{postStartHour}, ':',#{postStartMinute},':00'), event_post_end_date = CONCAT(#{postEndDate},' ',#{postEndHour}, ':',#{postEndMinute},':00'), event_start_date = CONCAT(#{eventStartDate},' ',#{eventStartHour}, ':',#{eventStartMinute},':00'), event_end_date = CONCAT(#{eventEndDate},' ',#{eventEndHour}, ':',#{eventEndMinute},':00'), event_title = #{eventTitle}, event_content = #{eventContent}, event_file_group_seq = #{fileGroupSeq}, update_id = #{memberId} WHERE event_seq = #{eventSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_file_attr( file_group_seq, original_file_name, save_file_name, file_path, file_size, file_ext, create_id, create_date, update_id, update_date ) VALUES( #{fileGroupSeq}, #{originalFileName}, #{saveFileName}, #{saveFilePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileExt}, #{memberId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{memberId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )
mapper.select: SELECT file_seq AS fileSeq, file_group_seq AS fileGroupSeq, original_file_name AS originalFileName, save_file_name AS saveFileName, file_path AS saveFilePath, file_size AS fileSize, file_ext AS fileExt, create_id AS createId, DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createDate, update_id AS updateId, DATE_FORMAT(update_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateDate FROM tb_file_attr WHERE file_group_seq = #{fileGroupSeq} AND use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS rnum, eventSeq, eventPostStartDate, eventPostEndDate, eventStartDate, eventEndDate, eventTitle, eventViewCnt, useYn, createId, createDate, updateId, updateDate FROM (SELECT event_seq AS eventSeq, DATE_FORMAT(event_post_start_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS eventPostStartDate, DATE_FORMAT(event_post_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS eventPostEndDate, DATE_FORMAT(event_start_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS eventStartDate, DATE_FORMAT(event_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS eventEndDate, event_title AS eventTitle, event_view_cnt AS eventViewCnt, use_yn AS useYn, create_id AS createId, DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createDate, update_id AS updateId, DATE_FORMAT(update_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateDate FROM tb_event WHERE 1=1
AND event_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') ) T, (SELECT @rownum:=0 FROM dual) R ORDER BY CAST(replace(@rownum, ',', '') AS UNSIGNED) desc LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} offset #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(event_seq) FROM tb_event WHERE 1=1
AND event_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT event_seq AS eventSeq, DATE_FORMAT(event_post_start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS eventPostStartDate, DATE_FORMAT(event_post_start_date, '%H') AS eventPostStartHour, DATE_FORMAT(event_post_start_date, '%i') AS eventPostStartMinute, DATE_FORMAT(event_post_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS eventPostEndDate, DATE_FORMAT(event_post_end_date, '%H') AS eventPostEndHour, DATE_FORMAT(event_post_end_date, '%i') AS eventPostEndMinute, DATE_FORMAT(event_start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS eventStartDate, DATE_FORMAT(event_start_date, '%H') AS eventStartHour, DATE_FORMAT(event_start_date, '%i') AS eventStartMinute, DATE_FORMAT(event_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS eventEndDate, DATE_FORMAT(event_end_date, '%H') AS eventEndHour, DATE_FORMAT(event_end_date, '%i') AS eventEndMinute, event_title AS eventTitle, event_Content AS eventContent, event_view_cnt AS eventViewCnt, event_file_group_seq AS eventFileGroupSeq, use_yn AS useYn, create_id AS createId, DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createDate, update_id AS updateId, DATE_FORMAT(update_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateDate FROM tb_event WHERE event_seq = #{eventSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_event SET use_yn = 'N', update_id = #{memberId}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE event_seq = #{eventSeq}
mapper.select: select T.event_join_seq AS eventJoinSeq, T.event_seq AS eventSeq, (select e.event_title from tb_event e where T.event_seq = e.event_seq) AS eventTitle, T.event_join_name AS joinName, T.event_join_phone AS joinPhone, T.event_join_email AS joinEmail, T.event_join_sex AS joinSex, T.event_join_birth AS joinBirth, T.event_join_addr AS joinAddr, T.event_join_state AS joinState from tb_event_join T WHERE T.event_seq = #{eventSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_event_join SET event_join_state = 'W', update_id = #{memberId}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE event_seq = #{eventSeq} AND event_join_seq in (${chkArray})
